channel.title: PI Thieving Stall
channel.description:
Hey,
Added today thieving to my server and it's [U]almost[/U] working.. Only problem is that I can't get Stalls work but other objects work.
When I click Baker's Stall I get this on CMD.
[code] objectId: 2561 ObjectX: 3084 objectY: 3489 Xoff: 2 Yoff: 1 [/code]
ActionHandler.java [code] case 2561: c.getThieving().stealFromStall(2561); //Baker's Stall break; [/code]
Thieving.java
[code] private enum StallData { BAKER(2561, new int[]{1897}, 16, 5), [/code]

item.title: PI Thieving Stall
item.dc:creator: @ruupe ruupe
item.description:
@ruupe wrote:

Hey,

Added today thieving to my server and it’s almost working… Only problem is that I can’t get Stalls work but other objects work.

When I click Baker’s Stall I get this on CMD.

objectId: 2561  ObjectX: 3084  objectY: 3489 Xoff: 2 Yoff: 1

ActionHandler.java

case 2561:
				c.getThieving().stealFromStall(2561); //Baker's Stall
				break;

Thieving.java

private enum StallData {
		BAKER(2561, new int[]{1897}, 16, 5),

Read full topic
